page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content:
This survey was undertaken by the children of Class 2 and former pupils of Apperknowle Primary School. They are: Deborah Allen, Samantha Bolland, Steven Beresford, Karl Briggs Joanne Clayton, Michelle Emmens Wendy Hird, John Jackson Joanne Lister, Helen Monaghan Rachel Monaghan, Stephen Robinson and Dean Wright. With former pupils: Paul Gregory and Nicola Holmes.
Out thanks also to Mr.W.Ward of Wards Garden Centre, Mr.R.Missin Field Officer for the Moss Valley Countryside Management Project, Northfield Junior School Dronfield and the families of the above children for becoming actively involved with the project.
